headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'nonce-abcdef' 'strict-dynamic' www.youtube.com www.youtube-nocookie.com; frame-src www.youtube.com www.youtube-nocookie.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self'; connect-src 'self'; require-trusted-types-for 'script'; base-uri 'self'; object-src 'none';
